title: Marcus Morris Sr. | New York Knicks | NBA.com
snippet: Morris will join the Knicks on a one-year deal, Shams Charania of The Athletic reports.

title: Marcus Morris, New York Knicks, PF - News, Stats, Bio - CBS Sports
snippet: Morris rejoins the Knicks after appearing in 49 games between the 76ers and Cavaliers last season, where he averaged 6.4 points and 2.7 rebounds in 16.7 minutes per game in the regular season.

title: Who is Marcus Morris Sr.? | RevUpSports.com
snippet: He plays as a power forward/small forward for the Los Angeles Clippers of the National Basketball Association (NBA).
